org.assertj.swing.image
Class ScreenshotTaker

java.lang.Object
  org.assertj.swing.image.ScreenshotTaker

public class ScreenshotTaker
extends Object

Takes screenshots of the desktop and AWT or Swing Components.

Author:
Alex Ruiz, Yvonne Wang

Constructor Summary

          Creates a new ScreenshotTaker.

Constructor Detail

ScreenshotTaker

public ScreenshotTaker()
Creates a new ScreenshotTaker.

Throws:
ImageException - if an AWT Robot (the responsible for taking screenshots) cannot be instantiated.
Method Detail

saveDesktopAsPng

public void saveDesktopAsPng(String imageFilePath)
Takes a screenshot of the desktop and saves it as a PNG file.

Parameters:
imageFilePath - the path of the file to save the screenshot to.
Throws:
NullPointerException - if the given file path is null.
IllegalArgumentException - if the given file path is empty.
IllegalArgumentException - if the given file path does not end with ".png".
IllegalArgumentException - if the given file path belongs to a non-empty directory.
IORuntimeException - if an I/O error prevents the image from being saved as a file.

takeDesktopScreenshot

public BufferedImage takeDesktopScreenshot()
Takes a screenshot of the desktop.

Returns:
the screenshot of the desktop.
Throws:
SecurityException - if readDisplayPixels permission is not granted.

saveComponentAsPng

public void saveComponentAsPng(@Nonnull
                               Component c,
                               @Nonnull
                               String imageFilePath)
Takes a screenshot of the given AWT or Swing Component and saves it as a PNG file.

Parameters:
c - the given Component.
imageFilePath - the path of the file to save the screenshot to.
Throws:
NullPointerException - if the given file path is null.
IllegalArgumentException - if the given file path is empty.
IllegalArgumentException - if the given file path does not end with ".png".
IllegalArgumentException - if the given file path belongs to a non-empty directory.
IORuntimeException - if an I/O error prevents the image from being saved as a file.

takeScreenshotOf

@Nonnull
public BufferedImage takeScreenshotOf(@Nonnull
                                              Component c)
Takes a screenshot of the given AWT or Swing Component.

Parameters:
c - the given Component.
Returns:
a screenshot of the given Component.
Throws:
SecurityException - if readDisplayPixels permission is not granted.

saveImage

public void saveImage(@Nonnull
                      BufferedImage image,
                      @Nonnull
                      String filePath)
Saves the given image as a PNG file.

Parameters:
image - the image to save.
filePath - the path of the file to save the image to.
Throws:
NullPointerException - if the given file path is null.
IllegalArgumentException - if the given file path is empty.
IllegalArgumentException - if the given file path does not end with ".png".
IllegalArgumentException - if the given file path belongs to a non-empty directory.
IORuntimeException - if an I/O error prevents the image from being saved as a file.
